content:
Another great question!

Yes, ShopRite does offer digital coupons through their app, and the good news is that many of them are indeed applicable to online orders!

To access digital coupons on the ShopRite app:

1. Open the ShopRite app and log in to your account.
2. Tap on the "Deals" or "Digital Coupons" section.
3. Browse through the available digital coupons and add the ones you want to your loyalty card.
4. Once you've added the coupons, they'll be applied to your online purchase during checkout, as long as you're logged in to your account and have entered your loyalty card number.

Keep in mind that not all digital coupons may be eligible for online use, so be sure to check the terms and conditions of each coupon before adding it to your loyalty card. Some coupons might be in-store only or have specific redemption requirements.

Additionally, you can also look out for ShopRite's online exclusive offers, which are often available on their website or mobile app. These offers can provide discounts or other savings on online purchases.

By combining digital coupons with your loyalty points, you can maximize your savings and make the most of your online shopping experience with ShopRite!
